description:
[Summary]
floating ip info does not contain information about associated instance if nova-network is used.
behaviour was changed between 11.05.16 and 21.06.16

[Topo]
devstack all-in-one node
libvirt+qemu
nova-network

[Description and expect result]
floating ip info contains information about associated instance as in previous releases.

[Reproduceable or not]
reproduceable

[Recreate Steps]
0) source any credentials. Result is the same for demo credentials of devstack (user=demo project=demo)
and for admin credentials.

1) boot instance
nova boot --image cirros-0.3.4-x86_64-uec --flavor 1 ttt

2) create floating ip
nova floating-ip-create

3) associate floating-ip
nova floating-ip-associate ttt 172.24.4.1

4) list intsances
nova list
+--------------------------------------+------+--------+------------+-------------+------------------------------+
| ID                                   | Name | Status | Task State | Power State | Networks                     |
+--------------------------------------+------+--------+------------+-------------+------------------------------+
| 8ad61db0-f388-4bc7-bfbd-728782a5b505 | ttt  | ACTIVE | -          | Running     | private=10.0.0.4, 172.24.4.1 |
+--------------------------------------+------+--------+------------+-------------+------------------------------+


5) list floating ips
nova floating-ip-list
+----+------------+-----------+----------+--------+
| Id | IP         | Server Id | Fixed IP | Pool   |
+----+------------+-----------+----------+--------+
| 1  | 172.24.4.1 | -         | -        | public |
+----+------------+-----------+----------+--------+


[Root cause anlyze or debug inf]
- database contains information about floating ip and record has a correct id of fixed ip
- database contains informtaion about fixed ip and record has a correct instance uuid

nova 'os-floating-ips' rest api calls network_api.get_floating_ips_by_project
it calls objects.FloatingIPList.get_by_project
it retrieves floating ips from DB and calls obj_base.obj_make_list for each record
obj_make_list calls _from_db_object of passed type and creates FloatingIP object

_from_db_object takes 'fixed_ip' as expected attributes but only FloatingIP.get_by_id passes it.
title: floating-ip info doesn't contain information about instance if associated (with nova network installation)

comments.content:
[Summary]
floating ip info does not contain information about associated instance if nova-network is used.
behaviour was changed between 11.05.16 and 21.06.16

[Topo]
devstack all-in-one node
libvirt+qemu
nova-network

[Description and expect result]
floating ip info contains information about associated instance as in previous releases.

[Reproduceable or not]
reproduceable

[Recreate Steps]
0) source any credentials. Result is the same for demo credentials of devstack (user=demo project=demo)
and for admin credentials.

1) boot instance
nova boot --image cirros-0.3.4-x86_64-uec --flavor 1 ttt

2) create floating ip
nova floating-ip-create

3) associate floating-ip
nova floating-ip-associate ttt 172.24.4.1

4) list intsances
nova list
+--------------------------------------+------+--------+------------+-------------+------------------------------+
| ID                                   | Name | Status | Task State | Power State | Networks                     |
+--------------------------------------+------+--------+------------+-------------+------------------------------+
| 8ad61db0-f388-4bc7-bfbd-728782a5b505 | ttt  | ACTIVE | -          | Running     | private=10.0.0.4, 172.24.4.1 |
+--------------------------------------+------+--------+------------+-------------+------------------------------+


5) list floating ips
nova floating-ip-list
+----+------------+-----------+----------+--------+
| Id | IP         | Server Id | Fixed IP | Pool   |
+----+------------+-----------+----------+--------+
| 1  | 172.24.4.1 | -         | -        | public |
+----+------------+-----------+----------+--------+


[Root cause anlyze or debug inf]
- database contains information about floating ip and record has a correct id of fixed ip
- database contains informtaion about fixed ip and record has a correct instance uuid

nova 'os-floating-ips' rest api calls network_api.get_floating_ips_by_project
it calls objects.FloatingIPList.get_by_project
it retrieves floating ips from DB and calls obj_base.obj_make_list for each record
obj_make_list calls _from_db_object of passed type and creates FloatingIP object

_from_db_object takes 'fixed_ip' as expected attributes but only FloatingIP.get_by_id passes it.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~apavlov-e

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/352612
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Change abandoned by Michael Still (<email address hidden>) on branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/352612
Reason: This patch has been sitting unchanged for more than 12 weeks. I am therefore going to abandon it to keep the nova review queue sane. Please feel free to restore the change if you're still working on it.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Andrey,
I am still following my patch. Since there were lack of reviews on this patch it was abandoned. I can reassign to myself and continue the work. Let me know if it is ok with you.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~anusha-unnam

comments.content:
Change abandoned by John Garbutt (<email address hidden>) on branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/352612
Reason: sylvain is correct, we are bug freezing this API, lets mark the bug as invalid.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content: While this bug is correct, this feature has now been deprecated, and is bug frozen.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~johngarbutt
